definition: cat/CL:隻|只[zhi1]/(dialect) to hide oneself/(coll.) modem
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Puma is a kind of catlike animals.
sentences.chinese: 美洲獅是一種貓科動物。

sentences.english: large feline of upland central Asia having long thick whitish fur.
sentences.chinese: 亞洲中部丘陵地區有白色長毛的大型貓科動物。

sentences.english: They're always keen to drag another cat down and rip it to pieces.
sentences.chinese: 它們總是喜歡拉下另一隻貓科動物並把它撕成碎片。

sentences.english: It is a big cat that hunts in the jungle.
sentences.chinese: 它是一隻大型的貓科動物，在叢林裏奔跑肆虐。

sentences.english: It is the largest living member of the Felidae family.
sentences.chinese: 它是世界上最大的貓科動物生活的家庭成員。

sentences.english: The tapir's main enemies are members of the cat family, such as tigers and jaguars.
sentences.chinese: 貘的主要敵人是諸如老虎和美洲豹之類的貓科動物。

sentences.english: A tiger is a kind of catamount animal. It looks like a cat, but much bigger than a cat.
sentences.chinese: 老虎是貓科動物的一種，它看起來像貓卻比貓大很多。

sentences.english: Big cats are killed in this way.
sentences.chinese: 大貓科的動物就是這樣被殺死的。

sentences.english: The leopard may be the hardest big cat to spot in the wild.
sentences.chinese: 花豹也許是最難在野外找到的大型貓科動物了。

sentences.english: Large felines such as lions and tigers are called big cats.
sentences.chinese: 大型貓科動物比如獅子和老虎被叫做大貓。

sentences.english: Tigers are the largest species of the Felidae family. They have unique vertical stripes.
sentences.chinese: 虎是貓科動物中體形最大的一種，身上有獨特條紋。

sentences.english: It is the world’s largest cat, weighing up to 300 kilograms.
sentences.chinese: 它是世界上最大的貓科動物，體重可達300公斤。

sentences.english: Pound for pound, the thylacoleo's bite is nearly twice as powerful as any big cat today.
sentences.chinese: 同樣，袋獅的咬合力幾乎是如今大型貓科動物的兩倍。

sentences.english: The scientists referred the tiger to the cat family.
In fact, there are collars, harnesses, and leashes designed just for cats.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，有衣領，吊帶，皮帶的設計只爲貓科動物。
虎，大型貓科食肉類動物。

definition: please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline
child bride/girl adopted into a family as future daughter-in-law
(coll.) lowest-ranking (student, participant etc)/to rank at the bottom of the list/to finish last
lit. to assess the head and discuss the feet (idiom); minute criticism of a woman's appearance/fig. to find fault in minor details/nitpicking/overcritical
